sentence.Network_en: The map will be redrawn centred on the position of Betelgeuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 地图将以参宿四为中心重绘.

sentence.Network_en: A red supergiant , Betelgeuse is no slouch of a star either.
sentence.Network_cn: 参宿四是一颗红色的超巨星.

sentence.Network_en: Most constellations have only one bright star, but Orion has two: Rigel and Betelgeuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数星座只有一颗明星, 但是猎户座有两颗: 参宿七和参宿四.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...5主要典型参宿四心宿二猎户座亮星极多，其中最著名的就属参宿四(betelgeuse)，它是红超巨星.

means.word_mean: 1. the second brightest star in Orion

auth_sentence.content: Use our guide for January to March to see wonders including the Orion Nebula, Betelgeuse and the planets Venus and Jupiter.

auth_sentence.content: Scullin says some of his childhood friends were known as Roach, Shark, Stinky Pig, Bogus, Trash, Betelgeuse and Gopher.
